examples: Here is where I met my spouse twelve years ago.
An Alzheimer patient's here may in his mind be anywhere he called home in the time he presently re-lives.

subdefinitions.definition: This point or stage in time, conceptualised as a location.
examples: I'd like to continue my story, but here is where I must stop.
I've done as much as I can; you'll have to take it from here .

definitions.definition: This time , the present situation . (Can we add an example for this sense?)

secondary_definitions: ( Can we verify this sense?) ( abstract ) This time , the present situation . (Can we add an example for this sense?)
